get.summary: Get a list of edge zone products

200.description: Returns list of edge zone products

default.description: Microsoft.Marketplace error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available Microsoft.Marketplace REST API operations.

default.description: Microsoft.Marketplace error response describing why the operation failed.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.

LanguageParameter.name: language
LanguageParameter.description: The language of the free texts

SelectParameter.name: $select
SelectParameter.description: Properties to be returned in the response.

SkipTokenParameter.name: $skipToken
SkipTokenParameter.description: The optional page continuation token that is used in the event of paginated result.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates Microsoft.Marketplace service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

PageResultOfCatalogItem.description: Represents a feed of entities that includes additional information that OData formats support.

nextPageLink.description: Gets the link for the next page of items in the feed.

count.description: Gets the total count of items in the feed.

items.description: Gets the collection of entities for this feed.

hasStandardContractAmendments.description: A value indicating whether standard contract amendments are present for this product

publisherMpnId.description: The publisher's Microsoft Partner Network (MPN) Id

determinedStorefronts.description: The list of the storefronts for which this offer is designated

standardContractAmendmentsRevisionId.description: Standard contract amendments for this product

universalAmendmentUrl.description: The universal amendment link for an enterprise contract.

isPrivate.description: A value indicating whether the item is private

isPreview.description: A value indicating whether the item is preview

isStopSell.description: A value indicating whether sale of this item is stopped

stopSellInfo.description: A StopSellInfo object providing stop sell related data

fulfillBeforeChargeEligible.description: A value indicating whether this item is eligible for fulfill before charge

marketingMaterial.description: Marketing material added by the publisher

ocpSolutionId.description: OCP solution id of the product

legalTermsType.description: Type of to the legal terms

privacyPolicyUri.description: Uri to the privacy policy of the product

categoryIds.description: List of category IDs the marketplace item belongs to

operatingSystems.description: List of operating systems the marketplace item supports

marketCode.description: Market code of a service offer

marketStates.description: Market states of a service offer

industryIds.description: List of industry IDs the item belongs to

primaryIndustry.description: List of industry IDs the item belongs to

primaryCategories.description: List of category IDs the item belongs to

cloudIndustryCategories.description: List of cloud industry IDs the item belongs to

supportedProducts.description: It maps to the list of products the publisher provides with which their offer works

applicableProducts.description: Product categories the offer belongs to

serviceType.description: Service type that applies to the offer

competencies.description: Competencies that apply to the offer

hasPrices.description: A value indicating whether the item has prices

duration.description: The duration that applies to the item

marketPricingDetails.description: The pricing details of each market to the item

pricing.description: The pricing that applies to the item

solutionAreas.description: The states that apply to the item

screenshotUris.description: List of screenshot image URIs provided for the item

links.description: List of Links provided for the item

filters.description: List of filters for the item

iconFileUris.description: Dictionary of icon image URIs by icon type

properties.description: Dictionary of properties provided for the item

plans.description: Plans available for the offer details

resourceGroupName.description: Resource group name the gallery item belongs to

additionalProperties.description: Dictionary of additional properties provided for the item

restrictedAudience.description: This fields supports setting explicit audience like subscription, tenant or user

isDeleted.description: A value indicating is the marketplace item deleted

isThirdParty.description: A value indicating whether the product is third party offer or not

groupId.description: This value is used to merge different entities to a single item

hideKeys.description: List of hide keys provided for the item

keywords.description: List of keywords provided for the item

pricingDetailsUri.description: Pricing details uri of the product

hasFreeTrials.description: A value indicating whether it has free trials

isByol.description: A value indicating whether it has licensed plans

isMacc.description: A value indicating whether it is MACC eligible

hasFreePlans.description: A value indicating whether it has free plans

isQuantifiable.description: A value indicating whether product is quantifiable

hasPaygPlans.description: A value indicating whether an offer has a 'Pay As You Go' plan

isReseller.description: A value indicating whether microsoft is acting as a reseller

isExcludedFromSearch.description: A value indicating whether the offer should be excluded from search

applicableStoreFronts.description: A value indicating which storefront this offer should surface on

offerVersion.description: Offer version specified by the publisher on publishing portal

isMicrosoftProduct.description: A value indicating whether it is a microsoft product

documentLinks.description: The list of document links provided for the item

linkedAddIns.description: List of linked Add Ins provided for the item

excludeFromBootstrap.description: A value indicating whether the offer should not be re-ingest during bootstrap session

disableSendEmailOnPurchase.description: Indication to disable sending email on purchase

hideFromSaasBlade.description: Indication to hide from SaaS blade

integratedWithMicrosoftGraphApi.description: Indication if there is integrated with Microsoft graph API

isCoreVm.description: Set to true only for offers of OfferType.VirtualMachine to indicate that it was originally of OfferType.CoreVirtualMachine

downloadLink.description: Download link for offers of type OfferType.PowerBIVisuals

downloadSampleLink.description: Download sample report link for offers of type OfferType.PowerBIVisuals

omexAssetId.description: Asset ID for offers of type OfferType.PowerBIVisuals

mixProductId.description: Product ID for offers of type OfferType.PowerBIVisuals

appFreeType.description: Whether an offer has additional purchases required

storeFrontPricings.description: storefront pricings parameters for AppSource and AMP

hideFromAdminPortal.description: the flag is used in embedded views

awards.description: the flag is used in embedded views

powerBIVisualId.description: the ID is used to correlate to a Visual for PowerBI

pricingTypes.description: The list of the pricing types for which this offer is designated

autoRunLaunchEvents.description: A list of auto run launch events for office products

searchScore.description: Gets or sets the search relevance score when it is linked to a search score

startDate.description: A value indicating when the sale of this item is going to be stopped

reason.description: A value indicating the reason for stopping to sell this item

alternativeOfferId.description: A value indicating an ID of an alternative offer provided by the same publisher

alternativePlanId.description: A value indicating an ID of an alternative plan of the same offer

OfficeCapabilityType.description:
1 = Capability1
2 = Capability2
3 = Capability3
4 = Capability4
5 = Capability5
6 = Capability6
7 = Capability7
8 = Capability8
9 = Capability9
10 = Capability10
11 = Capability11

RatingStars.description:
0 = None
1 = One
2 = Two
3 = Three
4 = Four
5 = Five

pricingOptions.description: A value indicating what pricing options are available on the application

deploymentTemplateFileUris.description: A dictionary containing the deployment template file IDs defined in the package manifest and corresponding URIs

deploymentFragmentFileUris.description: a dictionary containing the deployment fragment file IDs defined in the package manifest and corresponding URIs

pricing.description: Pricing that applies to the item

marketCode.description: Market code of a service offer

marketStates.description: Market states of a service offer

leadGenEnabled.description: An indicator if lead generation is enabled

legacyPlanId.description: Legacy plan Id which is obtained by combining Offer->LegacyId and PlanId with no separator in between

availabilities.description: List of availabilities for this plan

operatingSystem.description: Operating system info for this plan

uiDefinitionUri.description: What blade to open when someone wants to create a marketplace item

artifacts.description: Files related to the marketplace item

isPrivate.description: A value indicating whether the item is private

isHidden.description: A value indicating whether the plan is hidden

hasFreeTrials.description: A value indicating whether it has free trials

isByol.description: A value indicating whether it has licensed plans

isFree.description: A value indicating whether it has at least one free availability in any market

isPayg.description: A value indicating whether the plan is 'Pay As You Go'

isStopSell.description: A value indicating whether plan has been stopped from selling

stopSellInfo.description: A StopSellInfo object providing stop sell related data

cspState.description: A value indicating whether the product is available for purchase through CSP channel

isQuantifiable.description: A value indicating whether the plan is quantifiable

callToAction.description: The action that can be performed on this plan, on the storefronts

redirectUrl.description: URL to redirect the user to post the performed action on the storefronts

hasRI.description: A value indicating whether the plan supports reservations

isHiddenPrivateOffer.description: A value indicating whether the plan is used as hidden private offer requiring a quote

pricingTypes.description: The list of the pricing types for which this plan is designated

isPIRequired.description: A value indicating whether a payment instrument is required

msrp.description: Manufacturer's suggested retail price for the item

isPIRequired.description: A value indicating whether a payment instrument is required

appId.description: App id of the availability collection

planID.description: Plan Id of the availability collection

isStopSell.description: A value indicating whether it has been stopped from sell in a market

hasFreeTrials.description: A value indicating whether it has free trials

remediationRequired.description: A value indicating whether remediation is required to acquire availability

remediations.description: Remediation actions for acquiring availability if RemediationRequired is true

startDate.description: Availability effectiveness start date - in epoch minutes

endDate.description: Availability effectiveness end date - in epoch minutes
